fields.text: Does your country have a specific law (or legal provisions that are part of a broader law) dedicated to climate change mitigation, which is/are created by legislation, statute or other form of domestic law?
Does this law include an economy-wide emissions reduction target that is currently in force?
Are there clear mechanisms for setting and amending targets, timelines or baselines?
Is there a duty to set emission targets?
Does your mitigation law contain any of the following:
Another form of commitment to quantitative emissions reduction, whether in force now or to take effect in the future?
Other forms of mitigation measures?
Does the law provide for a strategic plan on mitigation or  low GHG emission development strategy?
Does the law contain provisions for national carbon budgeting  or  measures for ratcheting up the target in the future?
Is this legislation legally enforceable?
Does your country have other legislation containing emissions reductions targets or carbon budgeting measures?
Does your country have a specific law (or provisions that are part of a broader law) relating to climate change adaptation?
Does it contain provisions for climate risk and vulnerability assessments?
Does it contain provisions for national strategies or plans for adaptation and climate resilient development?
Does it contain a duty on the government or mandate to develop national strategies/plans for adaptation and climate resilient development ?
Are there procedural requirements relating to its creation (such as the requirement to consult)?
Does your country have a specific law (or provisions that are part of a broader law) establishing or designating national bodies or entities with responsibility for climate change matters?
Does the law provide for the body or bodies to have coordination functions related to climate change matters?
Does the law provide for the body or bodies to have an inter-agency coordination role across government departments/bodies?
Does the law provide for the body or bodies to have planning and/or regulatory powers and functions  (ie powers to develop policies/plans and/or execute laws)?
Does the law provide for the body or bodies to have functions related to national greenhouse gas (GHG) inventory preparation processes and reporting?
Does the law provide for the body or bodies to have responsibility for administering climate budget/climate finance?
Does the law provide for the body or bodies to have a scientific or technical advisory role on climate change matters?
Are there provisions for consultation with various relevant stakeholders on climate change matters?
Are there provisions concerning delivery of education, information or capacity-building related to climate change matters?
Does your country have provisions of laws or regulations establishing provisions for trading in emission allowances or permits or abatement certificates  (emissions trading mechanisms)?
Does the law link the country’s emission trading mechanism to an international market mechanism?
Does your country have provisions of laws or regulations establishing a carbon tax or levies for climate policy purposes?
Does your country have provisions of laws or regulations establishing incentives for voluntary emissions abatement actions?
Does your country have provisions of laws or regulations establishing fiscal incentives for mitigation of climate change (reduction or abatement of emissions?)
Does your country have provisions of laws or regulations designating or establishing a body responsible for administering climate budget/climate finance?
Does your country have legislation establishing a national climate fund?
Do provisions of laws or regulations specify sources of finance for climate change and/or how the funds will be raised?
Are there provisions for access to international finance?
Is procurement of any public goods and services regulated to promote climate change policy?
Are there regulation of financial markets (e.g. debt and equity markets)  for climate-related risks and investment (e.g. regulation of Green Bonds, disclosure requirements for listed companies)?
Does your country have provisions of laws or regulations requiring domestic reporting of greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions by the government?
Does the law designate an agency to prepare a national inventory and report on national emissions data?
Does your country have provisions of laws or regulations requiring reporting of greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions by companies, industrial installations or financial institutions?
Does your country have provisions of laws or regulations establishing a scheme for the verification of information reported (public or private entities)?
Does your country have legislation (or other formal law) imposing obligations on government to set targets or create plans/strategies relating to the overall energy system?
Does this include provisions requiring an integrated energy plan?
Does this include provisions requiring an estimation of future energy demand?
Does this include energy access provisions?
Does this include provisions requiring a diversification or mix of energy supply?
Does this include electricity interconnection provisions?
Does this include provisions requiring market parity between different sources of energy?
Does your country have legislation (or other formal law) establishing governance bodies for the energy system or regulating how it is governed?
Does this include provisions establishing a body responsible for co-ordination between the different energy sectors/sources?
Does this include provisions establishing an energy system advisory body?
Does this include provisions establishing an energy distribution/grid management body?
Does this include provisions establishing an energy regulator?
Does this include provisions requiring consultation of various stakeholders in governing the energy system?
Does your country have legislation (or other formal law) related to carbon transition planning?
Does this include provisions establishing targets for decarbonisation?
Are there specific targets for Electricity?
Are there specific targets for Heating and cooling?
Are there specific targets for Transport?
Are there specific targets for Industry?
Does this include provisions requiring the phase-out of high carbon sources?
Does this include just transition provisions?
Are there specific provisions for Electricity?
Are there specific provisions for Heating and cooling?
Are there specific provisions for Transport?
Are there specific provisions for Industry?
Does this include provisions aimed at the reduction of energy demand?
Are there specific provisions for Electricity?
Are there specific provisions for Heating and cooling?
Are there specific provisions for Transport?
Are there specific provisions for Industry?
Does your country have legislation (or other formal law) imposing obligations on government to set targets or create plans/strategies relating to the production of renewable energy?
Does this include provisions establishing targets for renewable energy production?
Does this include provisions requiring a strategy/plan for renewable energy production?
Does this include provisions prescribing the levels of production from different renewable energy sources?
Does this include provisions establishing a goal/obligation to promote renewable energy?
Does this include provisions establishing a goal/obligation to review and report on renewable energy?
Does your country have legislation (or other formal law) establishing governance bodies for the renewable energy production or regulating how it is governed?
Does this include provisions establishing a renewable energy co-ordination body?
Does this include provisions establishing a renewable energy advisory body?
Does this include provisions establishing a renewable energy regulatory body?
Does this include provisions establishing a rural electrification body?
Does this include Provisions requiring consultation of various stakeholders in governing renewable energy production?
Does your country have legislation (or other formal law) regulating, or creating obligations relating to, renewable energy production and consumption?
Does this include provisions establishing renewable energy obligations for energy users?
Does this include provisions establishing duties of renewable energy providers?
Does this include licensing provisions?
Does this include provisions establishing (general or operating) codes and standards for renewable energy?
Does this include provisions establishing (planning or environmental impact) codes and standards for renewable energy?
Does this include provisions creating tradeable instruments that certify electricity has been generated from renewable energy?
Does your country have legislation (or other formal law) regulating the distribution and storage of renewable energy (as electricity or other forms of storable renewable energy)?
Does this include provisions for the specification of grid standards?
Does this include provisions for grid management?
Does this include provisions for grid access and integration?
Does this include provisions relating to mini-grids?
Does this include provisions for distributed/off-grid/micro generation?
Does this include provisions for the storage of electricity?
Does this include provisions for load shifting and/or demand response management?
Does your country have legislation (or other formal law) establishing incentives or disincentives that promote or obstruct the production of renewable energy?
Does this include fiscal incentives for renewable energy in the form of grants, subsidies or compensation?
Does this include fiscal incentives for renewable energy in the form of loans or debt support?
Does this include fiscal incentives for fossil fuels?
Does this include feed-in tariffs for renewable energy?
Does this include provisions for the regulation of power purchase agreements?
Does this include provisions creating incentives for micro/self-use energy production?
Does this include provisions for taxation of renewable energy production?
Does this include provisions for taxation of fossil fuel production?
Does this include provisions establishing financial support for research and development into renewable energy and/or its production?
Does this include provisions creating energy auctions or another pricing mechanism for energy?
Does this include provisions creating concessions for the production of renewable energy?
Does this include provisions regulating tendering for the production of renewable energy?
Does this include provisions regulating mining activities?
Does this include provisions regulating waste management?
Does this include provisions regulating decommissioning for energy production infrastructure?
Does your country have legislation (or other formal law) relating to budgeting and financing for energy infrastructure?
Does this include overall budget/finance provisions for energy infrastructure?
Does this include provisions for renewable energy infrastructure finance?
Does this include provisions for fossil fuel energy infrastructure finance?
Does this include provisions regulating the return or remuneration from investments in energy infrastructure?
Does this include provisions regulating guarantees and/or risk sharing in investments in energy infrastructure?
Does your country have legislation (or other formal law) relating to areas of energy that are unique or distinctive in how they are regulated?
Does this include regulations for nuclear energy?
Does this include regulations for biofuels and waste?
Does this include regulations for hydrogen fuel cells?
Does your country have legislation (or other formal law) imposing obligations on government to set targets or create plans/strategies relating to energy efficiency?
Does this include provisions establishing energy efficiency targets?
Does this include provisions requiring strategies or plans for energy efficiency?
Does this include provisions establishing principles for energy efficiency?
Does your country have legislation (or other formal law) establishing governance bodies for energy efficiency or regulating how it is governed?
Does this include provisions establishing an energy efficiency co-ordination body?
Does this include provisions establishing an energy efficiency advisory body?
Does this include provisions establishing an energy efficiency regulatory body?
Does this include provisions requiring consultation of various stakeholders in governing energy efficiency?
Does your country have legislation (or other formal law) regulating, or creating obligations relating to energy efficiency?
Does this include provisions creating energy efficiency obligations?
Does this include obligations for large consumers?
Does this include obligations for the public sector?
Does this include obligations for utilities?
Does this include provisions creating energy efficiency codes and standards?
Does this include codes and standards for buildings?
Does this include codes and standards for products?
Does this include sectoral codes and standards?
Does this include codes and standards for vehicles and emissions?
Does this include provisions regulating information labelling and energy efficiency ratings?
Does this include provisions establishing energy efficiency/performance certificates?
Does this include provisions requiring energy efficiency audits?
Does this include provisions establishing energy efficiency market schemes?
Does this include energy efficiency procurement requirements?
Are there sectoral requirements for electricity?
Are there sectoral requirements for heating and cooling?
Are there sectoral requirements for transport?
Are there sectoral requirements for industry?
Does your country have legislation (or other formal law) establishing incentives or disincentives that promote or obstruct energy efficiency?
Does this include fiscal incentives for energy efficiency in the form of grants, subsidies or compensation?
Does this include fiscal incentives for energy efficiency in the form of loans or debt support?
Does this include fiscal incentives for energy efficiency in the form of tax relief or rebates?
Does this include provisions creating concessions for energy efficiency?
Does this include provisions establishing financial support for research and development into energy efficiency and/or its consumption?
Does this include provisions for energy consumption taxation?
Does this include provisions for energy use charges?
Does your country have legislation (or other formal law) relating to budgeting and financing for energy efficiency?
Does this include provisions for overall budgeting/financing of energy efficiency?
Does this include provisions for budgeting/financing of energy efficiency projects?
Does this include provisions regulating the return or remuneration of investments into energy efficiency schemes?
Does this include provisions regulating guarantees and risk sharing in investments into energy efficiency schemes?
Does this include provisions for energy performance contracting?
Does this include investment provisions for public/private partnerships?
Does your country have legislation (or other formal law) relating to the design and regulation of energy markets?
Does this include provisions establishing overall market principles?
Does this include provisions relating to market access?
Does this include provisions establishing an energy market board?
Does this include provisions on market transparency?
Does this include provisions on market integrity and market abuse?
Does this include market regulatory coordination provisions?
Does this include market design rules for promoting efficiency?
Does your country have legislation (or other formal law) relating to trade and competition within energy markets?
Does this include provisions establishing import tariffs?
Does this include provisions establishing non-tariff measures?
Does this include provisions relating to state aid or subsidies?
Does this include competition provisions?
Does this include competition provisions on restrictive agreements/arrangements?
Does this include competition provisions on abuse of dominant position?
Does this include competition provisions on ownership unbundling?
Does this include competition provisions on dumping?
Does your country have legislation designating a specific government authority(ies) (e.g. line ministry or department) in charge of agriculture (crops and livestock)?
Is there a duty for the authority(ies) to include climate change considerations in the development and implementation of agriculture policy/plans?
Does the legislation include a duty to collect and report information about GHG emissions from the agriculture sector?
Does your country have provisions in legislation or regulations creating disaster risk management and response mechanisms for agriculture (crops and livestock)?
Are there climate related insurance mechanisms for crops and livestock?
Are there early warning mechanisms for climate disasters?
Does your country have provisions in legislation or regulations that support sustainable agricultural production?
Do these include provisions on environmental criteria in the selection and use of fertilizers?
Do these include provisions on tillage and residues management?
Do these include provisions on sustainable water use and management (e.g. water harvesting and storage, irrigation)?
Do these include provisions promotion of climate-smart agriculture approaches?
Does your country have provisions in legislation or regulations on seed management ?
Do these include management of plant breeding?
Do these include protection of intellectual property of plant breeders and traditional farmers over seeds?
Do these include  seed registration requirements?
Do these include a seed quality control system?
Do these include representation of farmers and community enterprises in seeds governing bodies and/or institutions?
Does your country have provisions in legislation or regulations on soil management?
Do these include soil conservation bodies and/or institutions?
Do these include soil conservation (e.g. fertilizer use, limitation of damaging practices, regulation of crops that can be grown on particular types of soils)?
Do these include  soil pollution control?
Do these include soil erosion control?
Do these include  soil restoration?
Do these include soil fertility management (e.g. Integrated Soil Fertility Management)?
Do these include conservation of soil biodiversity?
Does your country have provisions in legislation or regulations on plant health and pest control?
Do these include pytosanitary protection and surveillance?
Do these include pest management (e.g. Integrated Pest Management)?
Does your country have provisions in legislation or regulations on pesticide management?
Do these include environmental considerations in pesticide management?
Does your country have provisions of law or regulations on livestock management?
Do these include feed management?
Do these include breeding management?
Do these include manure management?
Do these include disease monitoring (including pests)?
Do these include  sustainable livestock production?
Do these include management of  grazing and pasture land?
Do these include sustainable animal husbandry practices?
Does your country have provisions in legislation or regulations creating financing and/or incentives for CSA approaches?
Do these include loans and credits?
Do these include subsidies?
Do these include research and development?
Do these include payments for ecosystem services (PES)?
Do these include certification and/or labelling schemes?
Do these include carbon pricing mechanisms?
Does your country have legislation designating a specific government authority(ies) (e.g. line ministry or department) in charge of land use and management?
Is there a duty for the authority(ies) to include climate change considerations in the development and implementation of land use policy/plans?

Are there mechanisms for cross-sectoral coordination on land decision and policy making (including with authorities in charge of agriculture, forestry, water, environment, mining, industry, urban planning, etc.)?
Does your country have provisions of laws or regulations establishing a land cadaster/inventory that provides information about the occupation and use of land?
Does your country have provisions of law or regulations on spatial planning?
Are there requirements for spatial planning to consider climate change issues (e.g. climate vulnerability of specific areas)?
Are there requirements for environmental and social impact assessments for spatial planning?
Are there requirements for land use change that consider climate change policy goals (e.g. protection of specific areas due to their function as carbon sinks) ?
Does your country have provisions of laws or regulations on land management?
Do these include the objective of sustainable land management?
Are there requirements for sustainable surface and ground water management (e.g. integrated land and water management)?
Are there requirements to include climate change considerations in land management?
Are there provisions to combat desertification and land degradation, and promote restoration of degraded lands?
Are there provisions on incentives (e.g. subsidies, payment for ecosystem services) for sustainable land management practices?
Does your country have provisions of law or regulations on procedural rights applicable to land use planning and management?
Does this include Access to information?
Does this include Public participation and Free Prior and Informed Consent (FPIC)?
Does this include Access to justice and dispute resolution?
Does your country have legislation that ensures security of tenure?
Do these reflect the principles and recommendations of the Voluntary Guidelines on the Responsible Governance of Tenure of Land, Forest and Fisheries in the Context of National Food Security (VGGT)?
Do these include Dispute resolution mechanisms for tenure conflicts (e.g. due to climate induced displacement/migrations)?
Do these include Mechanisms to cope with climate change impacts on tenure rights (e.g. displacement due to climate induced disasters like sea level rise)
Does your country have legislation designating a specific Government authority(ies) (e.g. line ministry or department) in charge of forest use and management?
Is there a duty on the authority(ies) to include climate change considerations in the development and implementation of forest policy (e.g. enhancing forests as carbon sinks or no net forest loss)?
Does this include a mandate for regulating forest conversion?
Are there requirements to collect and report information about GHG emissions and removals by sinks from the forest sector?
Does your country have provisions of laws or regulations establishing a forestland cadaster/inventory?
Does your country have provisions of law or regulations on forestland use and planning?
Do these include definitions of the different uses of forests allowed (e.g. conservation, commercial, recreational)?
Do these include Rules for conversion of forestland to other uses that take climate change into account?
Do these include requirements of social and environmental impact assessment?
Does your country have legislation that ensures security of forest tenure?

Do these reflect the principles and recommendations of the Voluntary Guidelines on the Responsible Governance of Tenure of Land, Fisheries and Forests in the Context of National Food Security ( VGGT)?
Does your country have provisions of legislation or regulations on forest management?
Do these include the objective of sustainable forest management?
Do these include provisions to combat deforestation and forest degradation?
Do these include provisions to promote afforestation and reforestation?
Are there provisions governing illegal logging?
Do these include provisions on timber legality?
Do these include environmental requirements in the harvesting of timber (e.g. EIA, reforestation obligations, areas where timber is forbidden)?
Do these include requirements for timber trade?
Are there provisions promoting the use of wood products from sustainably managed forests?
Do these include provisions on access and use of non-timber forest products?
Are there provisions promoting participatory/community based forest management (if applicable to your country)?
Are there provisions on agroforestry?
Are there provisions creating a national forest monitoring system?
Does your country have provisions of law or regulations on procedural rights applicable to the forest sector?
Do these include Access to information?
Do these include Public participation and free, prior and informed consent?
Do these include Access to justice and dispute resolution?
Does your country have provisions in legislation or regulations creating financing and incentive mechanisms for sustainable forest management?
Do these include (as applicable to your country) a national forest fund?
Do these include (as applicable to your country) research & development funds for climate change adaptation and mitigation in the forest sector?
Do these include (as applicable to your country) payments for ecosystem services/results-based payments?
Do these include (as applicable to your country) certification and labelling schemes for sustainable forest products?
Does your country have provisions in legislation or regulations requiring multi-level institutional coordination for climate action and urban planning?
Do these include legal provisions that require coordination across line ministries at the national level*?
Do these include legal provisions that require coordination among local jurisdictions that belong to the same metropolitan area?
Do these include legal provisions that require coordination between neighbouring cities and rural areas that are part of the same economic, social or environmental functional areas?
Do these include legal provisions that require coordination among different line departments in local governments?
Does your country have provisions in legislation or regulations requiring engagement with local stakeholders, civil society and businesses in urban planning processes and climate planning processes?
Do these include legal provisions that grant the right of access to information across the planning process?
Do these include legal provisions that require participation across the planning process and not only when the urban plans have already been developed?
Do these include legal provisions that require planning institutions to tailor participatory processes to specific community needs?
Do these include legal provisions that require consideration of and response to community demands and priorities?
Do these include legal provisions that grant access to dispute or appeals mechanisms?

Does your country have provisions in legislation or regulations requiring data collection and sharing arrangements of climate sensitive information among different institutions dealing with urban planning and climate planning?
Do these include legal provisions that require data collection and sharing among subnational governments (different cities, regions, provinces)?
Do these include legal provisions that require data collection and sharing among different departments and institutions in the same city?
Does your country have provisions in legislation or regulations assigning local governments the mandate for urban planning in their urban areas?
Do these include provisions that require local governments to build and improve their capacities* to implement their mandates?

Do these include provisions that require or facilitate informal and flexible inter-municipal collaborations for urban and infrastructure planning when administrative boundaries do not correspond to functional boundaries and morphological boundaries*?
Does your country have provisions in legislation or regulations requiring the formulation of a national territorial plan*?
Do these include legal provisions that require the national territorial plan to establish an integrated national inland and coastal transportation and infrastructure network?
Do these include the legal requirement to coordinate the national territorial plan with national climate plans?
Do these include the legal requirement to assess the climate vulnerability associated with the implementation of the national territorial plan*?
Do these include the legal requirement to assess the greenhouse gas emissions associated with the implementation of the national territorial plan*?
Does your country have provisions in legislation or regulations requiring the formulation of regional territorial plans*?
Do these include legal provisions that require the coordination of the regional territorial plans with national climate plans?
Do these include legal provisions* to ensure that regional plans implement the objectives of the national territorial plan?
Do these include the legal requirement to assess the climate vulnerability associated with the implementation of the regional territorial plans?
Do these include the legal requirement to assess the greenhouse gas emissions associated with the implementation of the regional territorial plans?
Does your country have provisions in legislation or regulations that require the formulation of spatial plans for urban areas?
Do these include legal provisions that require urban plans to assess future land needs* and identify land safe from the effects of climate change adequate to meet these needs?

Do these include legal provisions that require the setting of urban growth boundaries or other growth management strategies* making sure that the amount of buildable land within the boundary is adequate to meet current and future land needs?
Do these include legal provisions that require a planning horizon of at least 20 years?
Do these include legal provisions that require reviews of urban plans if new climate risks or new climate adaptation options are identified?
Do these include legal provisions* to ensure that urban plans implement the objectives of the national territorial plan?
Does your country have provisions of law or regulations that require the consideration of climate risks and vulnerability for planned areas and infrastructure?
Do these include legal requirements concerning methods and processes to conduct risk and vulnerability assessments?
Do these include the requirement to conduct inclusive and participatory vulnerability assessments*?
Do these include a list of potential climate hazards* that need to be identified in the risk and vulnerability assessments?
Do these include a legal requirement to identify the places where climate hazards are most likely to occur through climate hazard maps?
Do these include the requirement to identify people, property and economic sectors exposed to risks arising from climate change?
Do these include the requirement for hazard maps to be publicly accessible?
Do these include the requirement that hazard maps need to be reviewed at least every 10 years?
Do these include the legal requirement to assess the climate vulnerability of urban plans and infrastructure through environmental impact assessments or strategic impact assessments?
Does your country have provisions of law or regulations on how to identify and prioritize adaptation options for the risks and vulnerabilities identified?
Do these include the requirement to assess the identified adaptation options based on time, cost, benefits and barriers to implementation?
Do these include the requirement to prioritize the adaptation options and select the preferred ones*?
Do these include the legal requirement for stakeholders' engagement in the process of identification and prioritization of the adaptation options?
Do these include the legal requirement to identify both infrastructure-based and ecosystem-based adaptation measures?
Do these include the legal requirement to have targets to improve the adaptation of urban areas with measurable and verifiable benchmarks against which progress can be assessed?

Do these include provisions that require the assessment of the urban plan's ability to meet the local, sub-regional and national governments' climate change strategies, adaptation targets and measures?
Does your country have provisions of law or regulations to facilitate implementation of the adaptation options identified for planned areas and infrastructure?
Do these include the provision for a public land buffer between sea and rivers, and land?
Do these include the requirement to establish riparian setbacks with widths based on scientific assessments and projections?
Do these include the requirement to establish coastal setbacks with widths based on scientific assessments and projections?
Do these include the requirement to develop integrated coastal zone management plans that integrate climate change adaptation considerations?
Do these include the legal requirement to plan the location of essential infrastructure* outside of flood-prone, high-risk areas?

Do these include the legal requirement to plan sewer systems, storm drains and wastewater treatment plants based on predicted rainfall, flooding (sea/river) and densification with a time horizon of at least 20 years?
Do these include the legal requirement to consider nature-based storm water management to manage increasing volumes of storm water in already built-up and expansion areas?
Do these include provisions that allow the land information system to integrate vulnerabilities and exposure of land parcels to climate hazards*?
Do these include the legal requirement to plan for evacuation routes and identify locations for low risk safety areas in case of extreme weather events?
Does your country have provisions of law or regulations to support the adaptation of slums and other vulnerable settlements to the effects of climate change?
Do these include differentiated and flexible planning and infrastructure standards for slums and other vulnerable settlements?

Do these include mechanisms to ensure the participation of all owners and residents* of slums and other vulnerable settlements in the process of upgrading with special consideration to women, youth, disabled people and elderly people?
Do these include the requirement to conduct community-led surveys, maps and household enumerations* to facilitate the adaptation of slums and other vulnerable settlements?

Do these include provisions that ensure the accessibility of water, sanitation and electricity services based on the provision of customary and non-documentary forms* in addition to formal tenure rights documents?
Do these include the legal requirement to maintain the affordability of the upgraded settlement for the pre-existing community and prevent its economic displacement*?

Does your country have provisions of law or regulations that support the relocation of populations from areas at risk from the effects of climate change to ensure their safety and health after all reasonable on-site alternatives and solutions have first been explored?
Do these include the requirement that the resettlement land need to be safe from current and future climate hazards?
Do these include a process for planned relocations with inclusive* consultation and engagement with the affected resettled and host communities?
Is there a legal requirement to provide the relocation site before occupation with livelihood opportunities, water and food security, sanitation, education and health facilities?

Does your country have provisions of law or regulations that ensure the security of tenure of people living in slums and other settlements vulnerable to the effects of climate change or whose tenure security might be affected by planned relocations?
Do these include the process to regularize* informal land and property rights?
Do these include provisions that allow a variety of tenure forms, including customary rights, informal tenure rights and occupation, to be recorded in the official land information system?
Do these include provisions of law or regulations on how evictions and relocations should be conducted*?

Do these include provisions for land acquisition that consider and compensate loss of formal rights, informal rights and interests and livelihoods for slum dwellers and resettled and host communities?

Do laws or regulations provide access to formal grievance, review, dispute resolution and redress mechanisms* for land and property disputes for people whose tenure security might be affected by the adaptation of slums, vulnerable settlements and planned relocations?
Do these include alternative dispute resolution mechanisms for land and property disputes such as customary institutions, negotiation, mediation and arbitration?

Does your country have provisions of law or regulations to ensure that planning and design standards for adaptation to climate risks and vulnerabilities are implemented, monitored and enforced through the development approval process?

Do these include provisions that allow governments to charge developers, either in cash or in kind through conditions to be attached to the approval of planning applications, for infrastructure costs associated with their developments*?
Do these include mechanisms to monitor compliance with the approved development and its conditions?
Do these include mechanisms for enforcement in the event developments are not compliant with the submitted application and its conditions?
Does your country have provisions of law or regulations that require assessment of the greenhouse gas emissions of different urban planning options?
Do these include provisions that require the estimation of existing carbon sinks?
Do these include provisions that require the production of different planning scenarios and the estimation of the greenhouse gas emissions associated with each scenario?
Do these include provisions that require the production of different planning scenarios and the estimation of the carbon sink potential associated with each scenario?

Do these include provisions that require the assessment of the plan's ability to meet the local, sub-regional and national governments' climate change strategies and plans, greenhouse gas reduction targets and measures?
Do these include the legal requirement for urban plans to have targets to reduce greenhouse gas emissions with measurable and verifiable benchmarks against which progress can be assessed?
Do these include the legal requirement to assess the greenhouse gas emissions associated with the urban plans*?

Does your country have provisions of law or regulations that promote a connected, accessible, and dense urban form that reduces car trips, and promotes walkability and the efficient use of public infrastructure?
Do these include provisions that promote connectivity through street design standards* for walkability and cycling?
Do these include provisions that promote connectivity through plot design rules* for a walkable streetscape?
Do these include provisions to promote accessibility* to jobs, housing, services, and shopping by promoting mixed land use*?
Do these include provisions that promote optimal urban density*?
Do these include provisions that require the consideration of existing and planned transport infrastructure in determining the allowed population densities near the infrastructure?
Does your country have provisions of law or regulations that promote a network of green spaces for environmental and climate services?
Do these include provisions of law or regulations that require the adequate distribution of green spaces across the city?
Do these include provisions of law or regulations that require connecting and planning together networks of green areas and water bodies?
Does your country have provisions of law or regulations that require neighbourhood design principles to achieve energy savings in buildings?
Do these include provisions of law or regulations that require the consideration of the thermal properties of urban surfaces*?
Do these include provisions of law or regulations that require plot design to achieve optimal orientation of the buildings for the purpose of energy saving in buildings*?

Does your country have provisions of law or regulations to ensure that planning and design standards that mitigate the emissions of greenhouse gases are enforced through the development approval process?

Do these include provisions that allow local governments to charge developers, either in cash or in kind through conditions to be attached to the approval of planning applications, for infrastructure costs* associated with their developments?
Do these include mechanisms to monitor compliance with the approved development and its conditions?
Do these include mechanisms for enforcement in the event developments are not compliant with the submitted application and its conditions?
Does your country have provisions of law or regulations that create a flow of resources to finance climate change mitigation and adaptation in urban planning?
Do these include provisions that give local governments the responsibility to collect locally generated revenues*?
Do these include provisions that give local governments the authority to decide how to spend locally generated revenues?
Do these include provisions that require local governments to earmark resources* for urban planning and climate change?
Do these include provisions that create enabling environments that facilitate the mobilization of investment capital?
Do these include provisions that allow local governments to receive a public credit guarantee from the national government*?
Do these include provisions that create frameworks for public-private partnerships?
Does your country have provisions of law or regulations that create incentives to achieve climate change mitigation and adaptation objectives in urban planning?
Do these include non-economic incentives* to support climate change mitigation in urban planning?
Do these include economic incentives* to support climate change adaptation in urban planning?
Do these include non-economic incentives to support climate change adaptation* in urban planning?
Does your country have provisions of law or regulations that create incentives to promote unsustainable urban land uses*?
Do these include non-economic incentives* that promote unsustainable urban land uses?
